be.schilduil.games.tekris
Class TeKrisScoreBoard

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--be.schilduil.games.tekris.TeKrisScoreBoard
public class TeKrisScoreBoard
extends java.lang.Object

The TeKrisScoreBoard class represents the score board in the TeKris game written for www.tentenkamp.be (TK in short, hence the T.K...).

Website

http://www.schilduil.be/java/TeKris.html
